data.name: Power Platform Community Conference
data.description:
Last year over 30,000 people joined us for the Microsoft Flow Online Conference.


Now, we are coming back and want YOU to join us for the 2020 POWER PLATFORM ONLINE CONFERENCE!


Come and join some of the best teachers, trainers and Power Platform MVP’s from around the…
